import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export const Banner = ({ color, imagen, title, subtitle, home, poster, courseBanner, speciality, info, }) => { return (
{home ? (

{title}

{subtitle}

Ver cursos
) : courseBanner ? (

{title}

{subtitle}

{info}

{speciality && (

Este curso forma parte de la especialidad{" "} {speciality}

)}
) : (

{title}

{subtitle}

)}
); };
